subject: Sales
title: Rejection Made Them Stronger
description: A short lesson to help you apply Rejection Made Them Stronger.

hook.text: Colonel Sanders was rejected 1,009 times before anyone said yes to his chicken recipe.

buildup.text: Every sales legend carries hundreds of rejection stories. It's the price of entry.

discovery.text: Psychologists call it desensitization. Each no stings less, until rejection barely registers.

twist.text: Numbness isn't the goal though. The best sellers learn from every no and adjust their approach.

climax.text: Rejection isn't failure. It's market feedback. The legends treated every no as free research.

punchline.text: Every no is a step closer to the right yes.

quiz.question: How did Colonel Sanders handle 1,009 rejections?
options: He gave up and tried something else
He kept going until someone said yes
